channel.title: media on BarCamp Cork
channel.description: Recent content in media on BarCamp Cork

item.title: Videos
item.description: Cork based TV and Video production company StormVids will be scooting and shooting throughout the day. Look out for their vids a few days later, all set to embed in your blogs and put on Facebook. I had a great chat with them last week and it’ll be fantastic to see some high-quality footage of BarCamp. At the more grainy end of things, I’m sure the usual suspects (like me) will also be QIkking, Ustreaming and Flixwagoning on their phones.
